一次大战期间最重要的两大结构革新是悬臂翼(cantilever wing)和硬壳式机身(monocoque fuselage)。不需要任何拉力钢绳的机翼称为悬臂翼,它的基本架构仍是翼梁与翼肋.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from French, from fuseler 'shape into a spindle', from fuseau 'spindle'

entry.tran: (飞机、导弹、火箭等的)主体部分;机身;弹体
entry.def: The fuselage is the main body of an aeroplane, missile, or rocket. It is usually cylindrical in shape.

means.word_mean: 1. the central body of an airplane that is designed to accommodate the crew and passengers (or cargo)
